title: Calories in Ragu Spaghetti Sauce
meta_description: Learn calories in ragu spaghetti sauce per 1/2 cup serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, sodium, fat, and quick recipe tweaks.
assumptions: Ragu Traditional Spaghetti Sauce; standard 1/2 cup (125g) serving; jarred, ready-to-use.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by Ragu variety, batch, and storage; check product label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 1/2 cup serving of Ragu spaghetti sauce contains 70 kcal and 480 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp olive oil per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Ragu spaghetti sauce?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal per 1/2 cup serving of Ragu Traditional.

faqs.q: What is the sodium content in Ragu spaghetti sauce?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 mg sodium per 1/2 cup serving.

faqs.q: Does Ragu spaghetti sauce have sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 7 g total sugars per 1/2 cup serving.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Ragu spaghetti sauce?
faqs.a: 11 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber, per 1/2 cup.

faqs.q: How does Ragu sauce nutrition compare to homemade?
faqs.a: Ragu is lower in fat but higher in sodium; homemade allows control over ingredients.
